title: The iMac is Dead. Good.
description:
There's a new M3 iMac, but is there really? All signs point to the iMac being a shadow of its former glory—but maybe that's not such a bad thing?

Buy an M3 iMac - https://amzn.to/3sBlnPt
Buy a Studio Display - https://amzn.to/40EYx6g
Buy an UltraFine 5K - https://amzn.to/40GXfHM
Buy a ViewFinity S9 (currently $1,199) - https://amzn.to/40JNvfO
